name: Elegant Midi Pleated Skirt
description: A sophisticated midi skirt with delicate pleats, crafted from lightweight chiffon for a flowy, feminine look. Perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

name: Bohemian High-Waist Maxi Skirt
description: Embrace free-spirited style with this high-waist maxi skirt, featuring a vibrant floral print and soft cotton blend for all-day comfort.

name: Chic A-Line Leather Skirt
description: Make a bold statement with this sleek A-line skirt made from premium faux leather, offering a modern edge for evening outings.

name: Luxury Satin Wrap Skirt
description: This luxurious satin wrap skirt exudes elegance with its smooth texture and adjustable tie, ideal for upscale events or stylish office wear.

name: Casual Denim Mini Skirt
description: A versatile denim mini skirt with a relaxed fit, featuring subtle distressing for a trendy, laid-back vibe perfect for everyday wear.

name: Tailored Pencil Skirt
description: This form-fitting pencil skirt is crafted from stretch fabric, offering a polished look for professional settings or chic evening plans.

name: Playful Polka Dot Skirt
description: Add a touch of fun to your wardrobe with this polka dot skirt, featuring a flared silhouette and lightweight fabric for effortless style.

name: Velvet Midi Skirt
description: Indulge in luxury with this plush velvet midi skirt, designed with a soft sheen and comfortable fit for cooler weather elegance.

name: Flowy Tiered Maxi Skirt
description: This tiered maxi skirt combines breezy layers with a soft linen blend, perfect for creating an effortless, boho-chic look.

name: Structured Pleated Mini Skirt
description: A preppy mini skirt with crisp pleats, crafted from durable cotton for a structured yet playful addition to your wardrobe.

name: Soft Knit Midi Skirt
description: Cozy yet stylish, this knit midi skirt offers a stretchy, comfortable fit with a subtle ribbed texture for casual elegance.

name: Embroidered Boho Skirt
description: This bohemian skirt features intricate embroidery and a flowing silhouette, crafted from breathable cotton for a unique, artisanal look.

name: High-Waist Tailored Skirt
description: Elevate your wardrobe with this high-waist skirt, designed with clean lines and a tailored fit for a timeless, professional aesthetic.

name: Flared Linen Skirt
description: A breezy linen skirt with a flared silhouette, perfect for warm days and effortless styling with a lightweight, natural feel.

name: Minimalist Wrap Skirt
description: This minimalist wrap skirt offers a sleek, adjustable design with soft cotton fabric, ideal for versatile and chic outfits.

name: Bold Plaid Midi Skirt
description: Make a statement with this bold plaid midi skirt, featuring a structured fit and vibrant pattern for a standout, preppy style.

name: Everyday Cotton Skirt
description: A simple yet stylish cotton skirt with a relaxed fit, perfect for everyday wear with a touch of casual charm.
